trans-unit.source: Associates activities together in a correlation by representing a particular shared <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey"></xref> or transient context in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Связывает действия в корреляцию, представляя определенный общих <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey"> </xref> или временный контекст в рабочем процессе.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[wf](~/add/includes/wf-md.md)] provides four types of correlation: [Content Based](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [Request-Reply](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [Durable Duplex](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Context Exchange](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] correlation, see [Correlation Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), the specific correlation types mentioned previously, and the correlation samples located in the [Services [WF Samples]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) node of the [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/add/includes/wf1-md.md)] samples.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]корреляции см. в разделе [Общие сведения о корреляции](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), упомянутые выше типы корреляции и образцы находятся в [службы [образцы WF]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) узел [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/add/includes/wf1-md.md)] образцы.

trans-unit.source: The runtime uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used.
trans-unit.target: Среда выполнения использует <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A>для корреляции, если он имеется, в противном случае **CorrelatesWith** будет использоваться свойство действия обмена сообщениями.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> or the workflow service is used.
trans-unit.target: Если отсутствуют оба свойства, предоставляемые дескриптор окружения <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>или используется в рабочем процессе.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> class.

trans-unit.source: Registers the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> with the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Регистрирует <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"> </xref> со средой выполнения рабочего процесса.

trans-unit.source: Unregisters the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> with the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Отменяет регистрацию <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"> </xref> со средой выполнения рабочего процесса.
